1.0.name: wordpress/u-paragraph-margin-remover
1.0.description: Remove paragraph tags' margin of post entry. This plugin doesn't tweak built-in javascript/PHP or edit raw data. Adding/editing post, Post author can select whether apply margin-less style or not on each post. So, prior posts before this plugin activation are impervious to margin-less style.
